name: Kohana + CL4 + XM Site Template
tagline: Template for Kohana + CL4 + XM Kohana Module
body:
# Kohana + cl4 + XM Template

This template includes everything needed to quickly get started using the [cl4](http://cl4.claero.com) and [XM](https://github.com/xmmedia/kohana_module) modules with Kohana. Right now it's setup to use Kohana 3.3.0.

## Setting Up a Site Using the XM Template

Instructions can be [found here, in the wiki](https://github.com/xmmedia/xm_template/wiki/Setting-Up-a-Site-Using-the-XM-Template).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
